tidbits.title: Strategic Location
tidbits.description: Somalia holds a strategic location along the Horn of Africa, with a significant coastline along the Indian Ocean, shaping its history and trade relations.

tidbits.title: Nomadic Heritage
tidbits.description: Somalia has a strong nomadic heritage, and pastoralism plays a crucial role in the culture and economy, defining the traditional way of life for many communities.

tidbits.title: Cultural Oral Traditions
tidbits.description: The country has a rich tradition of oral poetry and storytelling, with a wealth of historical and cultural knowledge passed down through generations.
